text:
In the lower section the link to the unless statement is a dev link
<https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/hubl/operators-and-expression-tests>

I’ve only seen something like this before when the form is contained in an element with the `zoom` style applied to it. Do you have a link to the page where this is happening?  If it is the `zoom` issue, there isn’t anything we can do because it’s implemented differently across different browsers and isn’t part of the spec
